name: kiosk v2
alt: A white touchscreen kiosk device with a gold-trimmed top suctioned to a glass window. To the right of it, next to an RFID card reader, is a card-sized device it connects to.

name: 8405 mk2.2
alt: A white plastic robot with four wheels and two metal skewer-like roller spokes sits atop a storage cabinet.
description: a robot that pushed plastic laser cutting to new limits.

name: angular intake
alt: A geared robotic mechanism sitting in a brightly lit environment with drops around it
description: the most advanced assembly i've made.

name: destination
alt: Tilted view of a distant highway bridge shimmering over water. There are stars in a blue-tinted sky above. A bike handlebar protrudes from the right side of the photo.
description: a calm river under the night sky.

name: twilight velocity
alt: Raindrops on a glistening stone bench in the foreground as a Tesla car passes by at a high speed in the background.
description: a car speeds past a rain covered bench.
